column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|
|Converter Rack|H0FL-P.V5|interface converter rack is designed to aggregate multiple E1/FE/GE/V.35 ports in one standard rack at the advantage of high integration and better management. It is 3U high
column2: 19” standard rack type used in centralside
column3: supporting up to 16 interface converting cards. It supports module as Ethernet access
column6: PDH multiplexer and soon. H0FL-P.V5 can connect to remote independent interface converters in the application of LAN

column3: 10/100/1000 Base-Tx half/full duplex auto-negotiation mode and manual mode (1000M full-duplex, 100M/10M half/full duplex), HP auto-MDIX
BNC, CC4, RJ-48C or dual-E1 socket
DCE main oscillator clock, DCE E1 line clock or DTE V.35 interface clock
RJ-45, using SNMP, 10Base-T Ethernet MDI port
Baud rate: 9600; Data bit: 8; Stop bit: 1; No parity bit; 9-pin D-type socket
